## StateChangeHandlers type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type StateChangeHandlers<C extends ChangeModel, T, R extends ReadModel = ReadModel> = Partial<{
    [K in keyof C]: StateApplyFunc<Change<TypeOf<C[K]>>, T, R>;
}>;
```
